name: Color Fill 3D: ShootOut
description:
To fill in puzzles, fill each square to unlock more addictive AMAZE Roller paint puzzles.
Swipe left, right, up and down to make the paintball rolling through all the white Maze.
Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.
Complete the levels of each three puzzles by covering every space with paint.

CHARACTERISTICS :
- Smooth ball-rolling action
- fun and relaxing game
- bright colors for all Coloful tastes
- Fluid paint the maze
